title: Finally Winter Has Arrived
linkText: Thing I learned today, Directives and JQuery
text:
After a two long week of exams its time to finally update and learn, this includes both in terms of coding and speed-running 
 Hopefully nothing will get in my way of learning... Few days later dang nabbit I got a fever. 
 Although I have the time to update the visuals of my site, JQuery to the rescue.
